name: wasm2c
install-command: git clone --recursive https://github.com/WebAssembly/wabt && cd wabt && mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. && cmake --build .
desc: A tool to convert WebAssembly binary files to C. Does not support WASI.
aot-command: cd wabt/wasm2c && ../build/wasm2c {input} -o temp.c && gcc temp.c wasm-rt-impl.c wasm-rt-mem-impl.c -Iwasm2c -lm -o {output} ; rm temp.c temp.h
